label: Contractor must continue performance of services if the Government exercises the option to extend services.
quote: The Government may require continued performance of any services within the limits and at the rates specified in the contract.

label: Contractor must accept rate adjustments only as a result of revisions to prevailing labor rates provided by the Secretary of Labor.
quote: These rates may be adjusted only as a result of revisions to prevailing labor rates provided by the Secretary of Labor.

label: Contractor must accept that the total extension of performance shall not exceed 6 months.
quote: The option provision may be exercised more than once, but the total extension of performance hereunder shall not exceed 6 months.

label: Contractor must accept option exercise by written notice from the Contracting Officer within 7 days.
quote: The Contracting Officer may exercise the option by written notice to the Contractor within 7 days.

label: Contractor must accept contract extension by written notice within 5 days, provided preliminary notice is given at least 10 days before contract expiration.
quote: The Government may extend the term of this contract by written notice to the Contractor within 5 days; provided that the Government gives the Contractor a preliminary written notice of its intent to extend at least 10 days before the contract expires.

label: Contractor must accept that the extended contract shall include the option clause.
quote: If the Government exercises this option, the extended contract shall be considered to include this option clause.

label: Contractor must accept that the total duration of the contract, including options, shall not exceed 60 months.
quote: The total duration of this contract, including the exercise of any options under this clause, shall not exceed 60 months.
